title: 20th January - What is expected on this day? since new season, new patch ?
body:
I would really like to know if anyone has any idea what will be on Wednesday? new patch? will jhin be released? i dont want to spend IP on a new champion just in case he does and just wanted to know, would be greatly appreciated

  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: The 20th is the start of the Ranked season, so I imagine there may be a small hotfix, and you will be able to begin your 2016 placements. Jhin will probably be scheduled for patch 6.2 in the coming weeks.
Okay guys thank you very much :)
Jhin will be out in roughly 2 weeks, so unless you're confident you can earn another 7800 IP in under two weeks, i would save it anyway, regardless of what happens on the 20th.
